title: Wicker Park-3 bed/2 bath, DW, AC, roof deck, pets ok, 9/1
posting_body: Please call Lourdes at 773-370-1989 to schedule a viewing.
Heart of Wicker Park - 3 bed/2 bath / 1343 N. Leavitt,
2nd Fl / $2700 / $350 per person move in fee / Available Sept. 1st /

Pet friendly with $250 per pet (2 pets max) / Easy Street Parking / Gas forced heating and AC (tenant responsible for gas and electric), Gas Fireplace, Common Roof deck / Coin laundry in building /  $50 credit/background check, 650+ credit score, No evictions and minimum 1 year lease.
Dimensions:
Living room: 12 x 18
Dining area: 12 x 10
Kitchen: 12 x 07
Primary bedroom: 13 x 12
2nd bedroom: 13 x 09
3rd bedroom: 13 x 09
Transportation: 5 min walk to Damen Blue Line, North Ave/ Division and Damen buses just steps away.
90/94 expressway 7min away.
Walk to restaurants, cafe's, shopping and nightlife!
Pet friendly with $250 pet fee per pet (2 max), $350 per person move in fee (No security deposit) and minimum 1 year lease.
